response.job_title: DevOps Engineer at Teleperformance | Mechatronics Engineer
response.summary: I am a Mechatronics Engineer and I am currently working as a DevOps Engineer at Teleperformance. I like to work in an organized and detailed way and I also like to work in teams. I am mainly interested in DevOps and Cloud.
response.skills: Azure DevOps, Microsoft Azure, Kubernetes, SonarQube, Jenkins, Ansible, Docker, Podman, Linux, Python, Git, Inglés, Trabajo en equipo, Trabajo organizado, Amazon Web Services (AWS), MongoDB, JSON, Autodesk Fusion 360

profile_positions.description:
Experience in:
+ CI/CD implementation using Azure DevOps pipelines
+ Implementation of SAST (SonarQube, Snyk) and DAST (OWASP ZAP) scans in pipelines
+ Azure resources management (App Service, AKS, SQL DB)
+ Application deployment using Helm Charts in Kubernetes
+ Bitbucket repository administration
profile_positions.title: DevOps Engineer

+ CI/CD implementation

+ Docker and Podman containers generation

+ Software development lifecycle management with IBM ELM

company.name: Teleperformance
company.description:
Teleperformance is a global digital business services company. Our global scale and local presence allow us to be a force of good in supporting our communities, our clients, and the environment. 
We deliver the most advanced, digitally-powered business services to help the world’s best brands streamline their business in meaningful and sustainable ways.
